Evolution-Platforms.description: We've placed development languages (such as Scala or Golang) here, as well as more low-level development frameworks (such as Play or Symfony), which are useful for implementing custom software of all kinds.

Augmented-Customer-Experience.description: Here we put information on methods and patterns concerning development, continuous x, testing, organization, architecture, etc.

Platforms-Workplace-Togther.description: This quadrant clusters technologies around the operation of software and infrastructure related platforms, tools and services.

Smart-Industries.description: Here we put different software tools - from small helpers to bigger software projects
